name: Bert Kaempfert
description: '''Bert Kaempfert''' (born '''{{langr|de|Berthold Heinrich Kämpfert}}'''; 16 October 1923 – 21 June 1980) was a German [[bandleader|orchestra leader]], multi-instrumentalist, music producer, arranger, and [[composer]]. He made [[easy listening]] and [[jazz]]-orientated records and wrote the music for a number of well-known songs, including "[[Strangers in the Night]]", "[[Danke Schoen]]", "[[Moon Over Naples]]" and "[[A Swingin' Safari]]".
